mapper.select: SELECT MEM_ID , MEM_PW , MEM_NAME , MEM_TELL , MEM_BIRTHDAY , MEM_GENDER , MEM_ZIPCODE , MEM_ADDR , MEM_ADDR_DETAIL , IS_ADMIN FROM TRIP_MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} AND MEM_PW = #{memPw}
SELECT MEM_NAME FROM TRIP_MEMBER WHERE MEM_NAME = #{memName} AND IS_DEACTIVATE = 'N'
SELECT MEM_ID FROM TRIP_MEMBER WHERE IS_DEACTIVATE = 'Y' AND MEM_ID = #{memId}
SELECT MEM_PW , MEM_NAME , MEM_ID FROM TRIP_MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} AND IS_DEACTIVATE = 'N'

SELECT MEM_ID , MEM_NAME , MEM_TELL , MEM_POINT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MEM_BIRTHDAY), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MEM_BIRTHDAY , MEM_GENDER , MEM_ADDR , MEM_ADDR_DETAIL , MEM_ZIPCODE , MEM_RANK FROM TRIP_MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}

SELECT BOOK_NUM , ITEM_NAME , BUY_PRICE , TRAVELERS , BOOK_DATE , TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE , TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DATE FROM BOOK_VIEW WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} ORDER BY BOOK_DATE DESC

SELECT TEMP_NAME , TEMP_TELL , TEMP_BIRTHDAY , TEMP_EMAIL , TEMP_ADDR , TEMP_ADDR_DETAIL , TEMP_GENDER , TEMP_ZIPCODE , BOOK_NUM FROM TEMP_MEMBER WHERE TEMP_EMAIL = #{tempEmail} AND BOOK_NUM = #{bookNum}
